title: 如何看待川普提名Brett Giroir 执委会美国代表？
contents:
WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump intends to nominate Assistant Secretary for Health Brett Giroir to be the U.S. representative to the World Health Organization's Executive Board, the White House said on Wednesday.

Giroir, an admiral in the U.S. Public Health Service Commissioned Corps, must be confirmed for the post by the U.S. Senate. The United States does not currently have a representative on the board, according to WHO's website.

(Reporting by Eric Beech; Editing by Mohammad Zargham)


https://www.nytimes.com/reuters/2020/03/18/us/politics/18reuters-health-coronavirus-usa-who.html


这对WHO未来的走向有什么影响？谭书记会滚蛋吗？对中国在该组织的影响有多大？
